Instrument.name: Plasma Energy Analyzer
Instrument.description: This experiment (APV-N) was designed to study (1) the mechanism of anomalously high ionization of cometary gas, (2) the shock-front structure, and (3) the phenomena in the region of the contact surface (ionopause). The analyzer had a frequency range of 0.1 to 1000 Hz, and was designed to monitor waves excited in the cometary environment, in particular the lower hybrid waves (10 Hz) and ion cyclotron waves (1 Hz).
